title: Former Love Island star Josh Moss doesn't understand reality stars who complain
text:
Josh Moss has slammed former reality stars who complain about the way they're portrayed on TV.

In an interview with The Sydney Morning Herald on Thursday, the 26-year-old former Love Island contestant said other reality stars should just behave better.

'If you don't want to look like a d***head, don't say d***head things,' he said simply.

Speaking out: Josh Moss (pictured) has slammed former reality stars who complain about the way they're portrayed on TV

According to Josh, TV editors wouldn't have material to work with if people didn't behave in a certain way.

'Some people think they got a rough run with the editors but at the end of the day, if you did it or you said it, it's not the editors' fault they put it out there,' he added.

And while many reality stars may go on TV looking for fame, Josh insisted his intentions behind wanting to appear on Love Island were mostly pure.

Best behaviour: In an interview with The Sydney Morning Herald on Thursday, the 26-year-old former Love Island contestant said other reality stars should just behave better. Pictured alongside fellow Love Island star Dom Thomas (left)

Acting up: According to Josh, TV editors wouldn't have material to work with if people didn't behave in a certain way

He said he was genuinely looking for love, and after trying 'every other option' available, decided to give reality TV a go.

'I liked the idea of being in front of the camera, being in the media world - that was in my mind a little bit - but my main objective was to try and find love,' he said.

It was during his appearance on Love Island that Josh met his girlfriend, Amelia Plummer, and more than a year after the show ended, they're still together.

True love: It was during his appearance on Love Island that Josh met his girlfriend, Amelia Plummer, and more than a year after the show ended, they're still together

The couple regularly share posts with one another on their respective Instagram pages, and celebrated their one-year anniversary in August.

'Happy one year, looking forward to forever more,' Josh wrote.

Added Amelia, 23: 'You have fit into my world so perfectly, it feels like you have always been in it. It's insane to think I found you on a reality show.'
description: Josh Moss has slammed former reality stars who complain about the way they're portrayed on TV. The former Love Island contestant said other reality stars should just behave better.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
